question: I feel safe to voice my opinions at work.
My contributions are recognized by my manager or peers.
I can admit mistakes without fear of negative consequences.
I understand how my role contributes to the company’s goals.
Leadership communicates the company’s vision clearly.
Team goals and expectations are well-defined.
Workload distribution is fair across my team.
Team members support each other during high-pressure periods.
Our meetings are productive and respectful.
I have opportunities to grow and develop at work.
I receive regular and helpful feedback from my manager.
The company invests in learning and development programs.
Diverse backgrounds and perspectives are respected in our team.
I feel I belong in this organization.
The workplace is free from discrimination and bias.
